channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: After months of infighting, House GOP could vote today to release the Epstein files
item.description: President Trump has pushed back against releasing the files, but shifted course over the weekend after it became clear the measure was likely to pass ...

item.title: Is a 50-year mortgage really that much crazier than a 30-year one?
item.description: Last week, the internet piled on President Trump's proposal for a 50-year mortgage. But maybe it's not as crazy as it sounds.

item.title: How 'defund Planned Parenthood' came to threaten primary care in rural Maine
item.description: Abortion is supported by 3 out of 4 Mainers, but a popular network of clinics that provides it alongside primary care has been shut out of Medicaid by...

item.title: Redistricting deadlines for the midterms loom as states wait for a Supreme Court ruling
item.description: Depending on the timing, a Supreme Court ruling that weakens Voting Rights Act protections against racial discrimination may lead to more states redra...

item.title: How NewJeans (almost) changed K-pop
item.description: The girl group had a vision for how to rewire its troubled industry. The industry had other plans.

item.title: Federal immigration agents will expand enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh, mayor says
item.description: Federal immigration authorities will expand their enforcement action in North Carolina to Raleigh as soon as Tuesday.

item.title: Group of South Carolina lawmakers look at the most restrictive abortion bill in the US

item.title: Roblox will require all users to perform age-checks to access chat from January
item.description: Starting Tuesday, users can voluntarily undergo the age-check process to secure access to communication features.

item.title: Databricks reportedly in talks to raise funding at a $130B+ valuation
item.description: Databricks is said to be in talks to raise a new round of funding just a few months after its last fundraise, which valued the company at $100 billion...

item.title: As consumers ditch Google for ChatGPT, Peec AI raises $21M to help brands adapt

item.title: Tennessee judge blocks Trump’s use of National Guard in Memphis but gives time for government appeal
